details: Updated MCP registry documentation to reflect public preview status, removing version-specific dates and adding current limitations.
Restructured MCP policy settings for clarity: renamed options, added enforcement warnings, and introduced IDE support table.

Added sidebar navigation link to Copilot tutorials index page.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
